sentences.en: A paperback edition is now available at bookshops.
sentences.cn: 平装本现在在书店可以买到。

sentences.en: Five hundred pounds and half the paperback right is a pretty solid crutch.
sentences.cn: 500镑再加上普及版权的收入,这可是大有所补了.

sentences.en: It was launched last year in paperback with an initial print run of 7,000 copies.
sentences.cn: 这本书的平装本在去年推出，首次印数为7,000册。

sentences.en: Many books that are out of print are reissued in paperback form.
sentences.cn: 许多绝版的书籍又以平装本形式重新出现.

sentences.en: Novels in paperback are available at that bookstore.
sentences.cn: 平装本小说在那家书店有售.
现在可以买到纸面平装本。

sentences.en: Oh! I see. I'll have the paperback, please.
sentences.cn: 噢! 我明白了. 请给我平装本的.

sentences.en: Paperback editions prolong its life and increase his income.
sentences.cn: 平装本延长了著作的寿命,使著作的收入有了增加.

sentences.en: She flicked through a romantic paperback between occasional dips in the pool.
sentences.cn: 用在泳池里游一阵后歇一阵的几个空当，她翻完了一本平装本言情小说。

sentences.en: She said she would buy the book when it comes out in paperback.
sentences.cn: 她说等那本书出平装本时再买。

sentences.en: The book might come out in paperback soon.
sentences.cn: 这本书不久可能以平装本出版.

sentences.en: The novel sold 200 , 000 copies in hardcover and 2 million in paperback.
sentences.cn: 那本小说的精装本卖了二十万册,平装本卖了两百万册.

sentences.en: There are paperback mysteries on the bookshelf.
sentences.cn: 书架上有平装的神秘小说.

sentences.en: When is it coming out in paperback ?
sentences.cn: 这本书的平装本什么时候出版？

sentences.en: When is the novel coming out in paperback?
sentences.cn: 那部小说的平装本什么时候出版?

sentences.en: Yes. We have both the paperback and the hardcover.
sentences.cn: 是的.我们有平装本和精装本.

words.tran_cn: 以平装本出版（paperback的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 纸面装订的；纸面平装本书籍的

trans.tran_en: a book with a stiff paper cover
